channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Intel earnings tell two stories, as revenue impresses but losses pile up from restructuring
item.description: The chip maker’s stock was moving lower after mixed results and guidance.

item.title: White House plan signals “open-weight first” era—and enterprises need new guardrails
item.description: Enterprises will not see immediate impact from the AI Action Plan, but it signals wider support for open-source models and evaluations.

item.title: Anthropic unveils ‘auditing agents’ to test for AI misalignment

item.title: Freed says 20,000 clinicians are using its medical AI transcription ‘scribe,’ but competition is rising fast
item.description: Rather than chase enterprise contracts with large hospital systems, Freed has focused on small clinics and solo practitioners.
